entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm except locally 10 mm south of Hare Bay. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
